jd: From: Vishal kumar, Vyze Inc vishal@vyzeinc.com Reply to: vishal@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Title: Facets DeveloperRemoteManager notes: We’re looking on finding someone with health insurance (payer) implementation experience.Description: • Facets Developer – C# and SQL for agile development for a Facets implementation role. This Developer position will participate in a team environment for the delivery and code for a Facets testing and implementation. Responsible for programming, debugging and testing of applications in a development environment. Generally responsible for database design and system testing. ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES • Strong healthcare domain knowledge (Healthcare Terminology). • Work experience in design develop solutions for inbound and outbound interfaces using PL/SQL and C#.NET. • Code review and unit testing • Release management best practices systems optimization environmental validation and issue resolution. • Good understanding of the Facets Data Model and work experience in building Facets extension • Familiar with the Core Facets batch jobs and EDI transactions (835 and 837). • Understand functional specs and create a detailed technical design (technical Design document). • Hands-on knowledge with SQL Server, Facets,• Support defect remediation, QA and release management procedures Experience with: • Facets customization development, working with extensions, integrations and / or data conversions. • Good understanding of Facets data model and Facets batch • .Net, C#, and SQL Server
